Reviews.Title: DEL E6500
Reviews.Author: RON JOHNSON
Reviews.Content: NICE LAPTOP, WORKS FINE, DECENT BATTERY LIFE (3-4 HRS). EVERYTHING WORKS CORRECTLY. NO RECOVERY OR INSTALL DISC INCLUDED. ALWAYS LIKED DELL PRODUCTS.

Reviews.Title: Decent
Reviews.Author: Renee Marie
Reviews.Content: Got this for my daughter to do an online class.  It has worked well, but she feels the video card may not be all that.  So far so good.  A Good deal for the price.

ProductInfo.Features:
Processor - INTEL Core 2 Duo || Memory Installed - 2048mb DDR2 > Upgradeable to 8192MB
Hard Drive - 80Gig Serial ATA || Optical Drive - DVD ROM || Screen Size - 15.0" WideScreen LCD
Internet Connection(s) - The installed 802 11 ABG WI-FI card will allow you to connect to any available wireless network, and the internal Ethernet port will allow a high speed wired connection
Software Installed - NEW Windows 7 Professional 32 Bit, word document & spreadsheet applications, shortcut to Microsofts free virus protection along with a restore partition on the hard drive for easy reinstallation. All software is Genuine!!
What's in the Box? - Dell Latitude E6500 with NEW pre-installed software, power cord, software registration instructions and a 60 day Warranty
ProductInfo.Name: Dell Latitude E6500 INTEL Core 2 Duo 80Gig Serial ATA HDD 2048mb DDR2 DVD ROM Wireless WI-FI 15.0" WideScreen LCD Genuine Windows 7 Professional 32 Bit Laptop Notebook Computer
